tool_description: This handy tool allows you to access the latest news about artificial intelligence from around the world, all in one place. Whether you're a business interested in keeping up with the latest trends, or just curious about what's going on, the AI news API is perfect for you.
name: AI News_v2
title: AI News

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Artificial Intelligence from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/gizmodo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all AI News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about artificial intelligence around the world
